text: Germán Rojas Gallego (born 10 April 1979), simply known as Germán, is a retired Spanish footballer who played as a central defender. ==Club career== Born in Lepe, Huelva, Andalusia, Germán graduated from neighbouring Sevilla FC's youth setup. He made his senior debuts in the 1998–99 campaign, in Segunda División B. On 9 April 2000 Germán made his first team – and La Liga – debut, starting and being sent off in a 0–3 away loss against Málaga CF.El Málaga hunde aún más al Sevilla (Málaga sinks Sevilla even more); El Mundo Deportivo, 10 April 2000 He appeared in three further matches with the main squad during the season, ending with relegation. In the 2000 summer Germán moved to another reserve team, Atlético Madrid B also in the third level. An undisputed starter, he played in more than 100 matches for the Colchoneros during his three-year spell. In January 2005, after a stint with CD Badajoz, Germán moved to Córdoba CF in Segunda División. He only appeared rarely in 2004–05 (which ended in relegation), but was a starter in 2005–06. In July 2006 Germán joined Alicante CF also in the third division. He appeared in 38 matches during his second season, as the Valencian returned to the second level after a 51-year absence. In June 2009, after suffering relegation back to the third level, Germán moved to Benidorm CF.Germán Rojas firma por dos temporadas (Germán Rojas signs for two seasons); La Verdad, 16 August 2009 He subsequently resumed his career in the same division but also in Tercera División, representing CD San Roque de Lepe (two stints)Germán Rojas volverá al San Roque tras su experiencia en Ceuta (Germán Rojas will return to San Roque after his stint at Ceuta); El Desmarque, 18 July 2012 and AD Ceuta. ==References== ==External links== * * Futbolme profile * * Germán at La Preferente * Germán at Footballdatabase Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:People from the Province of Huelva Category:Spanish footballers Category:Andalusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:La Liga players Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Sevilla Atlético players Category:Sevilla FC players Category:Atlético Madrid B players Category:CD Badajoz players Category:Córdoba CF players Category:Alicante CF footballers Category:Benidorm CF footballers Category:CD San Roque de Lepe footballers Category:AD Ceuta footballers
title: Germán Rojas Gallego
